EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Final Reach Out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
I just wanted to reach out one last time with a link to my calendar and contact information for you to have: https://calendly.com/krisfloyd/15-minute-teladoc-chat
If you have any further questions or need anything surrounding virtual health or telemedicine, please feel free to reach out. I would be more than happy to help and get you what you need.
Thanks again, Kris
Kris Floyd Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
